verses.verse: "Even today <WH3117> my complaint <WH7879> is rebellious. <WH4805> His hand <WH3027> is heavy <WH3513> in spite of my groaning. <WH585>
Oh that <WH5414> I knew <WH3045> where I might find <WH4672> him! <WH935> That I might come even to his seat! <WH8499>
I would set my cause <WH4941> in order <WH6186> before <WH6440> him, <WH4390> and fill my mouth <WH6310> with arguments. <WH8433>
I would know <WH3045> the words <WH4405> which he would answer <WH6030> me, <WH995> and understand what he would tell me. <WH559>
Would he contend <WH7378> with <WH5978> me in the greatness <WH7230> of his power? <WH3581> No, <WH7760> but he would listen to me.
There the upright <WH3477> might reason <WH3198> with him, <WH6403> so I should be delivered forever <WH5331> from my judge. <WH8199>
"If I go <WH1980> east, <WH6924> he is not there; <WH268> if west, I can't <WH995> find him;
He works <WH6213> to the north, <WH8040> but I can't <WH2372> see him. <WH5848> He turns south, <WH3225> but I can't <WH7200> catch a glimpse of him.
But he knows <WH3045> the way <WH1870> that I take. <WH5978> When he has tried <WH974> me, <WH3318> I shall come forth like gold. <WH2091>
My foot <WH7272> has held <WH270> fast to his steps. <WH838> I have kept <WH8104> his way, <WH1870> and not turned aside. <WH5186>
I haven't <WH4185> gone back from the commandment <WH4687> of his lips. <WH8193> I have treasured <WH6845> up the words <WH561> of his mouth <WH6310> more than my necessary food. <WH2706>
But he stands alone, <WH259> and who can oppose <WH7725> him? <WH5315> What his soul desires, <WH183> even that he does. <WH6213>
For he performs <WH7999> that which is appointed <WH2706> for me. <WH7227> Many such things are with him. <WH2007>
Therefore I am terrified <WH926> at his presence. <WH6440> When I consider, <WH995> I am afraid of him. <WH6342>
For God <WH410> has made my heart <WH3820> faint. <WH7401> The Almighty <WH7706> has terrified me. <WH926>
Because I was not cut off <WH6789> before <WH6440> the darkness, <WH2822> neither did he cover <WH3680> the thick darkness <WH652> from my face. <WH6440>
